ConfigItem.Desc: Vthm Limit Thresholds are set in Vthm Thermistor Configuration.

enum.key: Hottest region - Vthm up to Limit Threshold 1
Coldest region - Vthm over Limit Threshold 7

ConfigItem.Desc: Set to use this entry to control the charger

Set this to BAT to force the device to run from battery. If this is set to CHG then the device will run from charger unless overridden by the USB Power or Voltage Source Selector voltage source selectors.
When checked the application will reduce to the minimum power consumption possible. Useful for powering off the device at certain temperatures.
When set the LEDs are disabled while charging.
Either use the device default or specify a custom voltage limit to terminate charging.
Termination voltage in V. Only used if Termination Type is Voltage.

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: The Vthm input can be configured to use any of the available input sources given below.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CG724 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-BA_FORMFACTOR-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: This configures the time interval between Vthm updates in seconds while charging, 0 to disable.

StructElementConfigItem.Id: Vthm Read Period When Not Charging [s]
StructElementConfigItem.Desc: This configures the timer interval between Vthm updates in seconds while not charging, 0 to disable.
If a PIO drives the thermistor circuit, this parameter sets the required PIO number. When this value is set make sure Drive Thermistor Output ICS is set to N/A. Note that XIO 0-12 map to PIO 74-86.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: R13568v4 R13568v4_A05 CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CE446_CE692 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CF897 CF819 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: If an internal current source drives the thermistor circuit, this parameter sets the required internal current source LED. When this value is set make sure Drive Thermistor Output PIO is set to N/A

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF376_CG724 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA
CF133 CF133_SQIF CG437

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Delay in milliseconds between activating the thermistor drive output and taking the ADC reading. This allows the voltage level to settle before the data is sampled.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CE446_CE692 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: When set, the limit thresholds need to be entered as raw ADC counts, when clear they need to be in mV. For negative temperature co-efficient (NTC) thermistors, smaller values represent hotter temperatures.

ArrayElementConfigItem.Desc: For NTC thermistors this is the threshold of the hottest temperature region. The values are in units of ADC counts or millivolts depending on the setting of vthm.raw_limits. If fewer than seven limits are specified, the terminating value is 65535 (-1).

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CE446_CE692 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CF897 CF376_CG724 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

ArrayElementConfigItem.Desc: For NTC thermistors this is the threshold of the next cooler temperature region. The list is ordered in ascending order of ADC counts or millivolts depending on the setting of vthm.raw_limits. If fewer than seven limits are specified, the terminating value is 65535 (-1).
